style: Studio still‑life realism, rich navy backdrop, soft‑box strobe subtle fall‑off

shot.composition: static mid‑close (≈85 mm FF) — tall candlestick‑vase with purple clematis on left third; generous negative space right for bird’s path; tabletop edge visible low frame

timeline.action: Establish: clematis in razor focus, navy backdrop softly blurred; absolute stillness.
Golden turquoise‑throated puffleg enters from frame right, slightly out of focus, wingbeat blur already visible.
Bird eases into hover beside nearest blossom; body locks sharp, wings remain motion‑blurred at ~80 Hz.
Beak dips into clematis throat; petals flutter from down‑wash; fine pollen motes drift.
Hummingbird performs quick backward flip in place, then angles out toward frame right.
Accelerates and exits right; trailing wing‑blur streak tapers; vase regains complete stillness.
Hold two‑second tableau on vase and backdrop to punctuate calm return.

hummingbird.appearance: adult turquoise‑throated puffleg with iridescent golden overtones, 9 cm length, vivid emerald undertone at throat when light hits
hummingbird.physics: wingbeat ≈80 Hz; precise hover; 5 g mass causes negligible stem deflection yet visible petal tremor

clematis.appearance: deep‑violet blossoms with delicate veining; fresh green foliage
clematis.physics: stems sway subtly under air currents from bird; petals recover within 0.5 s

scene.location: dark‑navy seamless backdrop, matte walnut tabletop
scene.atmosphere: silent studio, only the faint hum of electronics

lighting.primary: large soft‑box 45° camera‑left, 6500 K diffused key on flowers and bird
lighting.secondary: low‑intensity rim from camera‑right bounce card to carve edges of hummingbird and vase

fx: high‑pitched wing‑hum (1–6 s), volume peaking at hover

color_palette.notes: deep navy (#0C2340) backdrop, rich violet clematis, warm golden‑emerald bird sheen, neutral wood base

prohibited_elements: lens flares, UI graphics, or timestamps
required_elements: sharp focus on clematis and bird’s body
